name: Elevated Bus Adventure 2018
description: Elevated bus Adventure 2018 is carried different levels which need to accomplish on specific time by driving mass transit bus. You may become pro bus drive by picking up passengers from bus stop and drop off them to another bus stop, be careful you have limited time and fuel to honor your job. Become furious bus driver as you have not any traffic hurdles in this game. So start your china bus engine and go for respect your driver duty. Park bus on given area which need to pick up citizens and drop of all on the specific bus parking area. You have to mange bus speed near to bus parking stop as furious speed may harm to your bus and parking area. So control your speed.
